title: PM, Interior minister discuss law and order, politcal situation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 21 (APP): Interior Minister Sheikh Rashid Ahmed called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Thursday and discussed law and order and political situation in the country.
The meeting also discussed in detail the situation in Afghanistan.
Thr Interior Minister also focused on the progress of ongoing development projects in Rawalpindi, especially the Nullah Leh project.
